00468 static inline void rtdm_context_lock(struct rtdm_dev_context *context)
00469 {
00470     atomic_inc(&context->close_lock_count);
00471 }
00472 
00473 static inline void rtdm_context_unlock(struct rtdm_dev_context *context)
00474 {
00475     atomic_dec(&context->close_lock_count);
00476 }

00527 #define RTDM_EXECUTE_ATOMICALLY(code_block)                                 \
00528 {                                                                           \
00529     spl_t   s;                                                              \
00530                                                                             \
00531     xnlock_get_irqsave(&nklock, s);                                         \
00532     code_block;                                                             \
00533     xnlock_put_irqrestore(&nklock, s);                                      \
00534 }

00737 static inline int rtdm_irq_request(rtdm_irq_t *irq_handle,
00738                                    unsigned int irq_no,
00739                                    rtdm_irq_handler_t handler,
00740                                    unsigned long flags,
00741                                    const char *device_name,
00742                                    void *arg)
00743 {
00744     xnintr_init(irq_handle, irq_no, handler, NULL, flags);
00745     return xnintr_attach(irq_handle, arg);
00746 }
00747 
00748 static inline int rtdm_irq_free(rtdm_irq_t *irq_handle)
00749 {
00750     return xnintr_detach(irq_handle);
00751 }
00752 
00753 static inline int rtdm_irq_enable(rtdm_irq_t *irq_handle)
00754 {
00755     return xnintr_enable(irq_handle);
00756 }
00757 
00758 static inline int rtdm_irq_disable(rtdm_irq_t *irq_handle)
00759 {
00760     return xnintr_disable(irq_handle);

00764 /* --- non-real-time signalling services --- */
00765 
00771 typedef unsigned                    rtdm_nrtsig_t;
00772 
00782 typedef void (*rtdm_nrtsig_handler_t)(rtdm_nrtsig_t nrt_sig);
00786 static inline int rtdm_nrtsig_init(rtdm_nrtsig_t *nrt_sig,
00787                                    rtdm_nrtsig_handler_t handler)
00788 {
00789     *nrt_sig = rthal_alloc_virq();
00790 
00791     if (*nrt_sig == 0)
00792         return -EAGAIN;
00793 
00794     rthal_virtualize_irq(rthal_root_domain, *nrt_sig, handler, NULL,
00795                          IPIPE_HANDLE_MASK);
00796     return 0;
00797 }
00798 
00799 static inline void rtdm_nrtsig_destroy(rtdm_nrtsig_t *nrt_sig)
00800 {
00801     rthal_free_virq(*nrt_sig);
00802 }
00803 
00804 static inline void rtdm_nrtsig_pend(rtdm_nrtsig_t *nrt_sig)
00805 {
00806     rthal_trigger_irq(*nrt_sig);
00807 }

00810 /* --- task and timing services --- */
00816 typedef xnthread_t                  rtdm_task_t;
00817 
00823 typedef void (*rtdm_task_proc_t)(void *arg);
00824 
00825 
00830 #define RTDM_TASK_LOWEST_PRIORITY   XNCORE_LOW_PRIO
00831 #define RTDM_TASK_HIGHEST_PRIORITY  XNCORE_HIGH_PRIO
00832 
00836 static inline int rtdm_task_init(rtdm_task_t *task, const char *name,
00837                                  rtdm_task_proc_t task_proc, void *arg,
00838                                  int priority, __u64 period)
00839 {
00840     int res;
00841 
00842     res = xnpod_init_thread(task, name, priority, 0, 0);
00843     if (res)
00844         goto done;
00845 
00846     if (!__builtin_constant_p(period) || (period != XN_INFINITE)) {
00847         res = xnpod_set_thread_periodic(task, XN_INFINITE,
00848                                         xnpod_ns2ticks(period));
00849         if (res)
00850             goto done;
00851     }
00852 
00853     res = xnpod_start_thread(task, 0, 0, XNPOD_ALL_CPUS, task_proc, arg);
00854 
00855   done:
00856     return res;
00857 }
00858 
00859 static inline void rtdm_task_destroy(rtdm_task_t *task)
00860 {
00861     xnpod_delete_thread(task);
00862 }
00863 
00864 void rtdm_task_join_nrt(rtdm_task_t *task, unsigned int poll_delay);
00865 
00866 static inline void rtdm_task_set_priority(rtdm_task_t *task, int priority)
00867 {
00868     xnpod_renice_thread(task, priority);
00869     xnpod_schedule();
00870 }
00871 
00872 static inline int rtdm_task_set_period(rtdm_task_t *task, __u64 period)
00873 {
00874     return xnpod_set_thread_periodic(task, XN_INFINITE,
00875                                      xnpod_ns2ticks(period));
00876 }
00877 
00878 static inline int rtdm_task_unblock(rtdm_task_t *task)
00879 {
00880     int res = xnpod_unblock_thread(task);
00881 
00882     xnpod_schedule();
00883     return res;
00884 }
00885 
00886 static inline rtdm_task_t *rtdm_task_current(void)
00887 {
00888     return xnpod_current_thread();
00889 }
00890 
00891 static inline int rtdm_task_wait_period(void)
00892 {
00893     return xnpod_wait_thread_period();
00894 }
00895 
00896 int rtdm_task_sleep(__u64 delay);

00901 /* --- timeout sequences */

00903 typedef __u64                       rtdm_toseq_t;
00904 
00905 static inline void rtdm_toseq_init(rtdm_toseq_t *timeout_seq, __s64 timeout)
00906 {
00907     *timeout_seq = xnpod_get_time() + xnpod_ns2ticks(timeout);
00908 }

00911 /* --- event services --- */
00912 
00913 typedef struct {
00914     unsigned long                   pending;
00915     xnsynch_t                       synch_base;
00916 } rtdm_event_t;
00917 
00918 static inline void rtdm_event_init(rtdm_event_t *event, unsigned long pending)
00919 {
00920     event->pending = pending;
00921     xnsynch_init(&event->synch_base, XNSYNCH_PRIO);
00922 }
00923 
00924 void _rtdm_synch_flush(xnsynch_t *synch, unsigned long reason);
00925 
00926 static inline void rtdm_event_destroy(rtdm_event_t *event)
00927 {
00928     _rtdm_synch_flush(&event->synch_base, XNRMID);
00929 }
00930 
00931 int rtdm_event_wait(rtdm_event_t *event);
00932 int rtdm_event_timedwait(rtdm_event_t *event, __s64 timeout,
00933                          rtdm_toseq_t *timeout_seq);
00934 void rtdm_event_signal(rtdm_event_t *event);
00935 
00936 static inline void rtdm_event_pulse(rtdm_event_t *event)
00937 {
00938     _rtdm_synch_flush(&event->synch_base, 0);
00939 }
00940 
00941 static inline void rtdm_event_clear(rtdm_event_t *event)
00942 {
00943     event->pending = 0;
00944 }

00971 /* --- mutex services --- */

00973 typedef struct {
00974     unsigned long                   locked;
00975     xnsynch_t                       synch_base;
00976 } rtdm_mutex_t;
00977 
00978 static inline void rtdm_mutex_init(rtdm_mutex_t *mutex)
00979 {
00980     mutex->locked = 0;
00981     xnsynch_init(&mutex->synch_base, XNSYNCH_PRIO|XNSYNCH_PIP);
00982 }
00983 
00984 static inline void rtdm_mutex_destroy(rtdm_mutex_t *mutex)
00985 {
00986     _rtdm_synch_flush(&mutex->synch_base, XNRMID);
00987 }

01009 static inline int rtdm_read_user_ok(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info,
01010                                     const void __user *ptr, size_t size)
01011 {
01012     return __xn_access_ok(user_info, VERIFY_READ, ptr, size);
01013 }
01014 
01015 static inline int rtdm_rw_user_ok(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info,
01016                                   const void __user *ptr, size_t size)
01017 {
01018     return __xn_access_ok(user_info, VERIFY_WRITE, ptr, size);
01019 }
01020 
01021 static inline int rtdm_copy_from_user(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info,
01022                                       void *dst, const void __user *src,
01023                                       size_t size)
01024 {
01025     return __xn_copy_from_user(user_info, dst, src, size);
01026 }
01027 
01028 static inline int rtdm_copy_to_user(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info,
01029                                     void __user *dst, const void *src,
01030                                     size_t size)
01031 {
01032     return __xn_copy_to_user(user_info, dst, src, size);
01033 }
01034 
01035 static inline int rtdm_strncpy_from_user(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info,
01036                                          char *dst,
01037                                          const char __user *src,
01038                                          size_t count)
01039 {
01040     if (unlikely(__xn_access_ok(user_info, VERIFY_READ, src, 1)))
01041         return -EFAULT;
01042     return __xn_strncpy_from_user(user_info, dst, src, count);
01043 }

01045 static inline int rtdm_in_rt_context(void)
01046 {
01047     return (rthal_current_domain != rthal_root_domain);
01048 }
